about_the_game:
This is the official (free to use) Level Editor for the 2D Action-Platformer Makis Adventure. Build your own Dungeons / Levels and share them with the Community.

About me:

My name is Mateo and Im the 22 years old solo-gamedeveloper behind Makis Adventure. I made the Level Editor within 2 months since community asked me to. I hope that you will enjoy building Levels and Im looking forward to play your Levels too!

Elements in the Level-Editor:

  • 10 different ground-variants (grass, stone, snow, ice, water etc.)

  • All the 9 enemies which can be found in the main-game

  • Different Backgrounds (jungle, underwater, sky, dungeon, snow mountains, vulcano)

  • Popular tools with Shortcuts: Pen, Eraser, Fill Selection, Block-Picker, Clear Selection etc.

  • A layer system (Background, Ground, Foreground)

  • Big selection of customization-options for your Levels

  • Save and Load your Level locally on your computer

  • Upload and share Levels to the Server
